headline: NXP Semiconductors Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: NXP Semiconductors N.V. (NASDAQ:NXPI) is among the 11 Best Semiconductor Stocks with Huge Upside Potential. NXP Semiconductors N.V. (NASDAQ:NXPI) stated that its board had authorized an interim dividend of $1.014 per ordinary share for Q3 2025. The dividend will be paid in cash on October 8, 2025, to shareholders of record on September 17, 2025. […]

headline: Microchip Broadens Offerings With Robust Portfolio Expansion
summary: MCHP strengthens its portfolio with MCP9604 IC, AI tools and FPGA advances, targeting growth across key industries.
